about_the_game:
A rhythm action game based on the viral idol trio "Under Ichigo" is here! Their first solo arena show is fully recreated in real-time 3D!

Take to the stage at one of Japan's largest venues, "Tokyo Super Arena," meticulously replicated down to the smallest details.

Enjoy breathtaking productions featuring over 100 types of dynamic lighting and stage effects.

And that's not all - the movements, provided by expert motion actors, are recorded using professional motion capture technology, allowing us to capture every action, right down to their fingertips!

The simple, intuitive rhythm action gameplay makes getting to grips with the game a breeze, even for newbies to the genre!

There are 8 original songs for you to enjoy, with exclusive costumes for each, allowing you to fully savor the girls' evolving charm.

One standout feature in this game is "Live Customization."

Select your favorite member to stand in the center position, change vocal parts, customize outfits, and create your own unique performance.

Personalize your very own "Under Ichigo" experience!

This game blends realistic live production, easy-to-learn yet hard-to-master rhythm action, and a high degree of customization.

Join Under Ichigo and create the ultimate live performance!

About "Under Ichigo"

Love as sweet as strawberries, aimed straight at your heart!
Meet Under Ichigo, a three-member idol unit from LIGHTUP PROMOTION, featuring Himeka Momoyama, Miyu Yuzuhara, and Mei Aoyama!

🌸Himeka Momoyama (Momoyama Himeka – Ichigo Pink)

The spoiled princess of Under Ichigo!
Born into a family of entertainers, she's been in the industry since birth, so has lived a very sheltered life.
Nickname: Hime-chan

🍋Miyu Yuzuhara (Yuzuhara Miyu – Ichigo Lemon)

The energetic style icon of Under Ichigo.
Shy but full of curiosity, she absolutely loves all things cute.
Nickname: MyuMyu

💙Mei Aoyama (Aoyama Mei – Ichigo Blue)

The earnest leader of Under Ichigo.
A former child star, she dreams of becoming an actress in the future.
Nickname: MeiMei
